features: 11 flip-top packs of 64 unscented baby wipes (704 wipes total)
Grab & Go: Cleans messes here, there and everywhere; take these unscented baby diaper wipes wherever you take messes; EZ Pull 1-Handed Dispensing makes it easy to grab wipes without wasting sheets
No Harsh Ingredients: Free of lotions, fragrances, parabens, alcohol, dyes and elemental chlorine; does not contain MIT or phenoxyethanol
Hypoallergenic, dermatologist tested and pH balanced to help maintain healthy skin
Plant-based wipes since 1990*; packaging may vary from image shown
body.description: Huggies Simply Clean Fragrance Free Baby Wipes offer convenience and cleanliness, making them a must-have for the whole family. Not only are they soft and safe for sensitive baby bottoms, but they can also be used to wipe hands and faces for toddlers and children. Kids outgrow diapers, not messes, so the Simply Clean unscented disposable wipes are the perfect solution wherever you go. These disposable diaper wipes are made with plant-based ingredients and have been for over 20 years to provide you and your baby a reliable clean. To help maintain healthy skin, the Simply Clean baby wipes are hypoallergenic, dermatologist-tested and pH-balanced. They also are fragrance free, alcohol free, paraben free and do not contain phenoxyethanol or MIT. The Huggies Simply Clean Baby Wipes feature flip-tops with EZ Pull 1-Handed Dispensing and exclusive Disney-themed packaging. (*70%+ by weight)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Because kids outgrow diapers, not messes Adventures can get messy. These versatile wipes clean up faces, hands, bottoms, and even surfaces. An unscented wipe you can always count on When you need an unscented baby wipe that can go anywhere and clean anything, we got you, baby. Use these wipes here, there, everywhere Take Huggies Simply Clean wherever you go, whether it's around the house, the playground or the car. Hypoallergenic & mild enough for sensitive skin Our fragrance free wipes can help keep your skin healthy, baby, without any harsh ingredients. Next page 1 Versatile Clean 2 Disney Designs 3 Fragrance Free 4 A Great Solution 5 Hypoallergenic

We got you, baby. Wipes and diapers. Mom and snuggles. Mac and cheese. These classic duos are always better together, baby! Pair up your wipes with Huggies Snug & Dry Baby Diapers, the perfect diapering duo with 12 hours of leak protection

What makes Huggies Simply Clean Baby Wipes right for you, baby? Messes can happen anywhere, baby. Huggies Simply Clean Wipes are sturdy enough for tough messes and gentle enough for your sensitive skin. Can these wipes take care of messes on my face & hands too? Exploring the world gets messy, baby. Our Simply Clean Fragrance Free Wipes are versatile and durable for giving a gentle clean wherever you need it. You might be wondering, baby — are these wipes scented? Skin can be a little sensitive, baby. Huggies Simply Clean Fragrance Free Wipes are hypoallergenic, fragrance- & lotion-free, and free of parabens and dyes. If you want a delicate scent, try our Natural Care Refreshing Wipes or Nourish & Care Wipes. Are these wipes easy to grab one-handed? Mom’s got her hands full, baby. But don’t worry, our baby wipes have EZ Pull 1-Handed Dispensing so it’s easy to grab just one wipe at a time without wasting sheets. Using the toilet is an important lesson to learn, baby, but are Huggies Wipes flushable? Designed for cushiony softness and durability, Huggies baby wipes don't easily break down after flushing. Please don’t flush baby wipes, and instead use the trash bin for your wipes and diapers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best of the best
reviews.reviewText: Huggies Simply Clean Fragrance-Free Baby Wipes are a parenting essential that I can't recommend enough. With a pack of 11, totaling 704 wipes, you'll have more than enough to keep your baby clean and comfortable.What sets these wipes apart is their fragrance-free formula. It's gentle on sensitive baby skin, ensuring that you won't have to worry about any skin irritations or allergies. The wipes are also thick and durable, making diaper changes and messy cleanups a breeze.The resealable packaging is convenient for on-the-go use, and the wipes dispense easily without sticking together. They are versatile and can be used for various purposes beyond diaper changes, such as cleaning hands and faces.One of the most significant advantages of Huggies Simply Clean wipes is their affordability, especially when bought in bulk like this. You get quality wipes at a reasonable price, making them a cost-effective choice for parents.In summary, Huggies Simply Clean Fragrance-Free Baby Wipes are a fantastic choice for parents looking for effective, gentle, and budget-friendly wipes. With this pack of 11, you'll have plenty to last, ensuring your baby stays clean and comfortable throughout the day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect choice for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I'm impressed! The affordability is a major plus, and the absence of any scent is perfect for sensitive skin. These wipes are gentle, effective, budget-friendly and they’re durable so they won’t rip on your skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wipes come out 1 at a time
reviews.reviewText: I have tried many body/baby wipes having the same problem with the wipes coming out in bunches. Not this product for I have bought and reordered the same product with the same result. I thought about this as to why this product is different. I came to at least one possible explanation. The round opening is larger than most opening could be the answer. It is also possible that the sheets are placed inside to prevent this annoying and costly way of selling wipes. No matter the reason I will continue to purchase until they change their packaging that the wipes eventually come out in bunches then I will go searching again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Strong cloth, stays moist, not overly soapy like others I've used. Doesn't irritate grandson's bumbum.DO NOT FLUSH! (Never flush ANY wipes. Even the flushable wipes...Unless you want to give my husband the plumber some of your hard earned cash)We keep one in our bathroom too, to freshen up. (Use paper first, of course) We wrap them in toilet paper to dispose in the trash can, as we do with any sanitary products.Good deal on subscribe and save.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most Cost Effective
reviews.reviewText: I was gifted a wide range of baby wipes - so many that this is my FIRST time purchasing wipes, and baby is almost 11 months old. So I can honestly and confidently say I've tried all the brands.What I like most about these wipes:- they are folded/perforated enough that you get a single wipe every time. With Pampers wipes, they often got stuck together when I tried to pull one out- the wipes themselves have a quilted texture on them. This texture helps pick up and hold the waste. The Pampers wipes were too smooth of a finish, the poo just smeared everywhereI browsed over a dozen product listings for wipes. These were the most cost effective when it came down to $ per wipe. Even cheaper than the Amazon brand. Even cheaper than Costco.I am very pleased with my purchase. I would easily and highly recommend these wipes. I will purchase them again when needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Convenient and Gentle Baby Wipes
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Huggies Simply Clean Fragrance-Free Baby Wipes, and overall, I am quite satisfied with their performance. The pack contains 11 individual packs, totaling 704 wipes, making it a great value for money. The wipes are a lifesaver for quick clean-ups and diaper changes, especially when I'm on the go.One of the standout features of these wipes is their fragrance-free formula, ensuring my baby's sensitive skin is not exposed to any unnecessary irritants. The wipes are gentle and soft, providing a comfortable experience for my little one.Another positive aspect is their effectiveness in cleaning messes. They do a fantastic job of wiping away dirt and grime, leaving my baby's skin feeling fresh and clean.The packaging design is also convenient. The wipes are well-sealed, preventing them from drying out, and the flip-top lid allows for easy one-handed access when dealing with a wriggling baby.However, one minor concern I have noticed on occasion is that the wipes tend to tear while pulling them out of the package. While this doesn't happen all the time, it can be a bit frustrating during those moments when you need a wipe quickly.In conclusion, Huggies Simply Clean Fragrance-Free Baby Wipes are an excellent choice for parents seeking gentle and effective wipes for their little ones. The pack offers great value, and the wipes themselves are gentle and efficient. Despite the occasional tearing issue, I still find them to be a reliable option and would recommend them to other parents looking for convenient and fragrance-free baby wipes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Huggies + subscription = lifesaver
reviews.reviewText: First time mom here. We found out early on that Huggies was ours and bubs favorite brand, and with so much else to think about with a new baby, using the Amazon subscription for wipes was a no-brainer.These wipes are soft and durable. No scent but also somehow smells clean. The package easily fits in the diaper warmer, diaper bag, and really anywhere else you need to carry wipes. They also work really well as multipurpose wipes (I’m looking at you, boogers and eye crusties).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Real convenient packaging
reviews.reviewText: My granddaughter really likes the fact that these are individual packages and she can have them all over the house and in the diaper bags and the fact that they are die free fragrance, free and chemical free is it plus for the baby skin.

Product came earlier then expected. The seller is very friendly & helpful and answered all questions in a timely matter. The wipes are as describe, soft & no un natural odours. I use these wipes for taking off my eye makeup & they work beautifully. I will definitely buy again from this seller. Thanks

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect for staying clean even if you are a full grown adult
reviews.reviewText: I have been using these wipes for many years without problems. Sometimes toilette paper is not enough people. Bidets are common in Europe, but here in North America they expect us to use our out-in-the-woods-skills like we are all maple-bacon-loving-lumberjacks in plaid, and tight jeans, Mukluks and Canada Goose jackets with no class.They are a staple in my bathroom routine and go anywhere I go. I have turned many people onto them as well without saying a word because I am telepathic like that.It is the only way to ensure that I am feeling squeaky clean not owning an essential life saving bidet. Because in Canada, we love being extra dirty.This has avoided getting UTIs ( urinary tract infections) for years now.So not only are they good for babies, but adults too. I never had an allergic reaction and I am sensitive to chemicals. They are perfume free, which is great.I highly recommend adding them to your bathroom routine. Toilet paper is not enough ever in my opinion. It’s not like we have an auto A$$ wiper machine like the year 2035 will.
Great value. These are great for cleaning many things, not just baby bottoms! :)
Such a great deal, Usually I would get 2 for $10-$11 dollars in store but I got 3 for $9-$10!!!
It’s good for baby skin, unscented and easy to carry.
